## DynamicFormDefaultOptions interface

Represents default configuration options for all dynamic forms in module scope.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicFormDefaultOptions 
```

## Remarks

Supplied with injection token [DYNAMIC\_FORM\_DEFAULT\_OPTIONS](./dynamic-forms.dynamic_form_default_options.md)
